definition: virtuoso piper wins a beauty/the xiao 箫 (mouth organ) virtuoso 萧史 won for his wife the beautiful daughter of Duke Mu of Qin 秦穆公
to blow/to play a wind instrument/to blast/to puff/to boast/to brag/to end in failure/to fall through
xiao, a Chinese musical instrument of ancient times, similar to panpipes

to play the xiao 簫|箫[xiao1] (mouth organ)/to beg while playing pipes; cf politician Wu Zixu 伍子胥[Wu3 Zi3 xu1], c. 520 BC destitute refugee in Wu town, 吳市吹簫|吴市吹箫[Wu2 shi4 chui1 xiao1]/to busk/virtuoso piper wins a beauty, cf 玉人吹簫|玉人吹箫[yu4 ren2 chui1 xiao1]/(slang) fellatio/blowjob
romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)
poetic occasion/elegant situation/in literature, the cue for a poem
to part for an unspecified period/to take leave from indefinitely
free of worldly concerns/above the fray/at peace with the world
lit. the sun sets in Yanzi (idiom)/fig. the day is drawing to an end/the last days (of a person, a dynasty etc)
lit. boat made of lily magnolia wood/poetic term for boat
